*[[David Bottoms]] - Georgia Poet Laureate
*[[David Bottoms]] - Georgia Poet Laureate
*William H. Bruce - Mercer's first doctoral graduate (1890); president, [[Tarleton State University]], 1899-1900; president, [[University of North Texas]], 1906-1923<ref>http://www.tshaonline.org/handbook/online/articles/BB/fbrae.html</ref>
*William H. Bruce - Mercer's first doctoral graduate (1890); president, [[Tarleton State University]], 1899-1900; president, [[University of North Texas]], 1906-1923<ref>http://www.tshaonline.org/handbook/online/articles/BB/fbrae.html</ref>

[[File:Nancy Grace Book Cover.jpg|thumb|150px|right|[[Nancy Grace]] is an [[United States|American]] [[legal]] [[Political commentator|commentator]] and the host of ''[[Nancy Grace (TV program)|Nancy Grace]]'', a nightly news and [[current affairs (news format)|current affairs show]] on the [[HLN (TV network)|Headline News]] television network. She earned her undergraduate degree from Mercer in 1981 and graduated from Mercer's [[Walter F. George School of Law]] in 1984.]]
 
*[[Harry Stillwell Edwards]] - former editor, ''[[Macon Telegraph]]''; author of 19 books including the Southern classic ''Eneas Africanus''
*[[Harry Stillwell Edwards]] - former editor, ''[[Macon Telegraph]]''; author of 19 books including the Southern classic ''Eneas Africanus''
